title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3127/90 of 29 October 1990 fixing for the period 1 November to 31 December 1990 the Community offer prices for artichokes applicable with regard to Spain
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3127/90
of 29 October 1990
fixing for the period 1 November to 31 December 1990 the Community offer prices for artichokes applicable with regard to Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the period 1 November to 31 December 1990 the Community offer price for artichokes (CN code 0709 10 00), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all sizes, shall be 89,84.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 October 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
